scripts.build-css: node-sass-chokidar --output-style compressed --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules --include-path node_modules/patternfly/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/patternfly-react/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets src/ -o src/
scripts.watch-css: yarn build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path node_modules/patternfly/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/patternfly-react/dist/sass --include-path node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
